word_group.brief_definition: 娱乐读物；有趣的书；娱乐性书籍
具有娱乐性且发人深省
令人愉悦的和引发焦虑的

bilingual.target: 它非常有趣且有教育意义。

bilingual.source: Some people say that new stories written in books today are not as entertaining as the old ones.
bilingual.target: 有些人说今天书中写的新故事不如老故事有趣。
他们发现这部电影非常有趣。

bilingual.source: We found the play to be quite entertaining.
bilingual.target: 我们发现这出戏非常有趣的。

bilingual.source: The book is both educational and entertaining.
bilingual.target: 这本书既有教育意义又有趣的。

bilingual.source: The movie's plot was farcical but entertaining.
bilingual.target: 这部电影的情节荒谬但很有趣。

bilingual.source: The movie was entertaining but devoid of depth.
bilingual.target: 这部电影很有趣，但缺乏深度。

bilingual.source: The caton show was both entertaining and educational.
bilingual.target: 这个卡通节目既有趣又有教育意义。

yingyinNormal.en: It was very entertaining, despite the glaring story problem.
yingyinNormal.zh: 倒挺适合打发时间，虽然有显而易见的情节漏洞。

yingyinNormal.en: Think we need to start entertaining the possibility that the Shamy could go on for years.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们得考虑谢米恋发展数年的可能性。

yingyinNormal.en: This is worse than when I had to admit that Cedric the Entertainer's actually entertaining.
yingyinNormal.zh: 承认这点比有一次我得承认搞笑艺人塞德里克真的很搞笑还不爽。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, that wasn't as entertaining as when he rents bowling shoes, but it was right up there.
yingyinNormal.zh: 虽然不如他租保龄球鞋时搞笑，不过也相差无几了。

yingyinNormal.en: What's going on? Just finished entertaining at a children's party. Mr. Berenstain was a big hit.
yingyinNormal.zh: 怎么回事？刚刚去儿童派对表演来着，贝贝熊先生大受欢迎。

yingyinNormal.en: We've gotten a little off-topic. Allow me to make things entertaining again in this little Spockumentary. That was Leonard's joke.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们有点跑题了，就让我来说个笑话，给这部"史"记增加点娱乐性，那是莱纳德想的笑话。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 供人娱乐的; 娱乐性的

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 娱乐；娱乐活动；招待；款待；请客；文娱表演
adj. 供人娱乐的；娱乐性的

word_family.mean: v. 给…娱乐；使快乐；对（意见；建议；感情）给予考虑；招待；款待

sense_info_list.zh: 供人娱乐的; 娱乐性的

examination_example.sentence: Where Eliasson is at his most <highlight>entertaining</highlight>, and his disorienting installations bring home the reality of the destructive effects we are having on the planet.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这是埃利亚松最有趣的地方，他令人迷惑的装置作品揭示了我们对地球的破坏性影响。

examination_example.sentence: An <highlight>entertaining</highlight> way of enhancing your analytical skills is to engage them by playing "brain games".
examination_example.sentence_trans: 提高分析能力的一种娱乐方式是通过玩“脑力游戏”来吸引他们。

examination_example.sentence: However, our idea is for it to be also fun and <highlight>entertaining</highlight>, something which traditional documentaries aren't so much.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然而，我们的想法是让它也变得有趣和精彩，这是传统纪录片所没有的。

examination_example.sentence: That may not all be very <highlight>entertaining</highlight> in the modern sense of the world.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在现代意义上，这可能都不是很有娱乐性。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。
